metadata.title: CVE-2022-28204 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A denial-of-service issue was discovered in MediaWiki 1.37.x before 1.37.2.Rendering ofw/index.php?title=Special%3AWhatLinksHere&target=Property%3AP31&namespace=1&invert=1can take more than thirty seconds. There is a DDoS risk.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
